name: WKAlertControllerStyle
desc: Constants indicating the styles for standard system alerts.

items.name: case alert
items.desc: An alert sheet with stacked buttons. The alert sheet includes a default Cancel button at the bottom of the sheet. You can add other buttons, which are placed above the Cancel button.

items.name: case sideBySideButtonsAlert
items.desc: An alert sheet with side-by-side buttons.

items.name: case actionSheet
items.desc: An action sheet style. Action sheets are modal sheets that can be dismissed using the Cancel button in the top-left corner of the sheet. You can also add one or two custom buttons to perform related tasks.
